programme.title: Intersection, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: An architect (Richard Gere) on the brink of a car accident recalls troubles with his wife (Sharon Stone) and his mistress (Lolita Davidovich) in Vancouver, British Columbia.

programme.title: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A '50s-era housewife (Julianne Moore) uses her wit and winnings from commercial jingle contests to help support her large family.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) visits a nudist camp to prove a French maid (Elke Sommer) innocent of murder.

programme.title: The Deep House, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: While diving in a remote French lake, two YouTubers who specialize in underwater exploration videos discover a house submerged in deep waters. Their dive turns into a nightmare when they discover the house was the scene of atrocious crimes.

programme.title: The Passenger, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Randy is perfectly content to fade into the background, but when one of his co-workers goes on a sudden and violent rampage, he must face his fears and confront his troubled past to survive.

programme.title: There's Something Wrong With the Children, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Margaret and Ben take a weekend trip with two longtime friends and their two young children. Ben soon suspects something sinister is afoot when the kids start behaving strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

programme.title: Mimic, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: Married scientists (Mira Sorvino, Jeremy Northam) battle killer cockroaches that develop the ability to assume human form.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: A black bird resurrects a rock musician (Brandon Lee) who then avenges his own murder and his fiancee's.

programme.title: Event Horizon, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: Billy, on the move again, ends up in Chihuahua, Mexico, with a new Mexican friend called Segura; together they enjoy several risky escapades -- but in the end, Billy risks losing his life.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: Billy bumps into a new character called Pat Garrett, who is riding with Jesse and the 7 Rivers Gang; Billy joins them - but law makers are already closing in; they plan to flee to Lincoln County - but not before Billy fulfils one last promise.

programme.title: The Haunting, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: Rings, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: A young woman (Matilda Lutz) makes a horrifying discovery after her boyfriend (Alex Roe) investigates a story about a mysterious video that kills people seven days after they watch it.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: An Old West sharpshooter (Tom Selleck) goes to Australia, where his new boss (Alan Rickman) expects him to kill Aboriginal Australians.

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: A man with no name (Clint Eastwood) and a man with a mission (Lee Van Cleef) hunt a Mexican bandit (Gian Maria Volonte) for different reasons.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: A former Marine (Thomas Ian Griffith) returns to Vietnam to rescue a comrade (Chris Mulkey) and retrieve nuclear triggers.

programme.title: My Dead Boyfriend, (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) goes on a manic quest to learn the truth about her boyfriend after she finds him dead on their couch.

programme.title: Unhuman, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Seven misfit students must band together against a growing gang of unhuman savages. Their trust in each other gets tested to the limit in a brutal, horrifying fight to survive as they take down the murderous zombie creatures.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Following a night of drinking in a ski-resort hot tub, four pals awake in 1986, getting a chance to rewrite the past.

programme.title: Undercover Brother, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: A low-rent private detective poses as a preppy nerd in order to foil a plot by conspirators.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A professional child-finder (Eddie Murphy) is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan boy from a shape-shifting villain (Charles Dance).

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: A Manhattan playboy (Eddie Murphy) gets a new corporate boss (Robin Givens), and she treats him the way he has always treated women.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hip detective (Eddie Murphy) from Detroit tracks a crime ring to a Los Angeles fun park called WonderWorld.

programme.title: 48 HRS., (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A rumpled detective gets a slick convict released into his custody for two days to help him find a murderer in San Francisco.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Tim's investigation pays off in ways he never imagined and Sigsby scrambles to avert disaster, Luke must finally decide who he can trust.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Happy Birthday!, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: When two friends embark on a journey to the seediest parts of Mexicali for a birthday celebration, they quickly realize their trip has taken a dangerous turn that involves sex, drugs, torture and a ransom involving the Mexican cartel.

programme.title: A Chorus Line, (1985, Musical)
programme.desc: Dancers auditioning for a musical reveal their innermost thoughts and desires in this adaptation of the Broadway show.

programme.title: Into the Wild, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: A top student and athlete leaves his middle-class life to venture into Alaska, only to meet people who will eventually shape his values and life.

programme.title: A House on the Bayou, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Hoping for an idyllic getaway, a couple and their daughter visit a remote mansion in rural Louisiana. When suspiciously friendly neighbors show up uninvited, the weekend soon takes a sinister turn as dark secrets test the family's fragile bond.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem, (2023, Animated)
programme.desc: The Turtle brothers take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.

programme.title: IF, (2024, Family)
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyone's imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: Gung Ho, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: American autoworkers have a hard time accepting new work ethics when a Japanese car manufacturer takes over.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A rich reporter tours outback Australia with a crocodile hunter, then brings him to Manhattan.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two dopey dudes (Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter) go back in time to fetch Beethoven, Napoleon and other biggies for a history project.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: The dopey dudes (Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter) beat the Grim Reaper (William Sadler) in a board-game contest, so he must help them stop their evil robot twins.

programme.title: Bill & Ted Face the Music, (2020, Comedy)
programme.desc: The ruler of the future tells best friends Bill and Ted they must compose a new song to save life as we know it. But instead of writing it, they decide to travel through time to steal it from their older selves and bring harmony to the universe.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Eye of the Needle, (1981, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Nazi spy (Donald Sutherland) seduces the wife (Kate Nelligan) of a crippled pilot (Christopher Cazenove) on the Scottish coast before D-Day.

programme.title: Curse of the Pink Panther, (1983, Comedy)
programme.desc: Interpol sends the world's worst detective (Ted Wass) to find French police inspector Jacques Clouseau.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist (Ben Kingsley) leads the hunt for a genetically engineered creature who morphs into a human blonde and tries to reproduce in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A half-alien female (Natasha Henstridge) escapes from a government compound to search for the half-alien male who has been raping and fatally impregnating women.

programme.title: Species III, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An alien hybrid beauty (Sunny Mabrey) follows her overwhelming, but deadly, urge to mate while commandos hunt her down.

programme.title: Species: The Awakening, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: With help from her uncle, a woman (Helena Mattsson) who is a half-human, half-alien clone searches for the scientist who created her.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Telling fortunes to support herself and her daughter, a psychic widow (Cate Blanchett) assists the police in a missing persons case.

programme.title: In the Land of Saints and Sinners, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: Hoping to leave his dark past behind him, former assassin Finbar Murphy leads a quiet life in a coastal Irish town. However, when terrorists show up, he must soon choose between exposing his secret identity and defending his friends and neighbors.

programme.title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Optimus Prime and the Autobots take on their biggest challenge yet. When a new threat capable of destroying the entire planet emerges, they must team up with a powerful faction of Transformers known as the Maximals to save Earth.

programme.title: Armageddon, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A NASA rep (Billy Bob Thornton) recruits an oil driller (Bruce Willis) and his team of mavericks to save Earth from an oncoming asteroid.

programme.title: King Kong, (2005, Adventure)
programme.desc: Members (Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody) of a film crew encounter prehistoric beasts and a gigantic ape on mysterious Skull Island.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Tim's investigation pays off in ways he never imagined and Sigsby scrambles to avert disaster, Luke must finally decide who he can trust.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Three Wishes, (1995, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A frustrated family man recalls an encounter he (Joseph Mazzello), his widowed mom (Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio) and his family had with a mysterious vagrant (Patrick Swayze) in 1955 suburbia.

programme.title: The African Queen, (1951, Adventure)
programme.desc: An imperious woman (Katharine Hepburn) makes a gin-soaked boat captain (Humphrey Bogart) fight Germans in the World War I Congo.

programme.title: Wuthering Heights, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: Emily Bronte's Cathy (Juliette Binoche) and Heathcliff (Ralph Fiennes) fuel two generations of gothic romance on the Yorkshire moors.

programme.title: Fame, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Students (Asher Book, Kristy Flores, Paul Iacono) at New York's High School of Performing Arts see if they have the dedication and talent necessary to achieve their dreams.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Romance)
programme.desc: An ex-hockey player (D.B. Sweeney) and a prima donna (Moira Kelly) bicker as paired figure skaters shooting for the Olympics.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romance)
programme.desc: A literary baseball groupie (Susan Sarandon) romances a pitcher (Tim Robbins) and a catcher (Kevin Costner) on a minor-league North Carolina team.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland team's new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A corporate dictator (John Houseman) tries to oust the star player (James Caan) of a brutal 21st-century spectator sport.

programme.title: K2, (1992, Adventure)
programme.desc: A playboy Seattle lawyer (Michael Biehn) and a family-man professor (Matt Craven) join an expedition climbing the Himalayan peak.

programme.title: Days of Thunder, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: An upstart stock-car driver goes to the edge for his manager, his brain-surgeon girlfriend and himself.

programme.title: Coach Carter, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A high-school basketball coach (Samuel L. Jackson) turns a losing team around, then faces criticism for pushing the athletes to put grades first.

programme.title: School Ties, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: A scholarship student (Brendan Fraser) hides his Jewish heritage to fit in at an Eastern prep school in the mid-1950s.

programme.title: K2, (1992, Adventure)
programme.desc: A playboy Seattle lawyer (Michael Biehn) and a family-man professor (Matt Craven) join an expedition climbing the Himalayan peak.

programme.title: Missing in Action, (1984, War)
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) escapes from the Viet Cong, then comes back with a floating arsenal to get others out.

programme.title: Missing in Action 2: The Beginning, (1985, War)
programme.desc: An imprisoned U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) fights the military overlord (Oh Soon-tek) of a slave-labor opium operation in Vietnam.

programme.title: Max, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: The family of a fallen Marine adopts his traumatized service dog, giving both the four-legged veteran and a troubled teen the chance to heal.

programme.title: Max 2: White House Hero, (2017, Children)
programme.desc: Max, a military service dog, is assigned to serve on the U.S. president's Secret Service detail.

programme.title: School Ties, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: A scholarship student (Brendan Fraser) hides his Jewish heritage to fit in at an Eastern prep school in the mid-1950s.

programme.title: Days of Thunder, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: An upstart stock-car driver goes to the edge for his manager, his brain-surgeon girlfriend and himself.

programme.title: Coach Carter, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A high-school basketball coach (Samuel L. Jackson) turns a losing team around, then faces criticism for pushing the athletes to put grades first.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romance)
programme.desc: A New York comedian (Woody Allen) recalls his lost love, a kooky singer (Diane Keaton) with a style all her own.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romance)

programme.title: True Legend, (2010, Action)

programme.desc: Thomas Jerome Newton (David Bowie) is a humanoid alien who comes to Earth to get water for his dying planet. He starts a high technology company to get the billions of dollars he needs to build a return spacecraft.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Swing into Action: Part 2
programme.desc: With The Sledgehammer set to strike, Yuya uses Pendulum power to swing the duel his way! Can this phenomenal new summoning method help Yuya hammer the Hammer?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Trade Bait: Part 1
programme.desc: It could be curtains for Yuya when a rival student cons him out of his Pendulum Cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Trade Bait: Part 2
programme.desc: Still shocked by Sylvios Pendulum Summon, Yuya must find his focus if he wants to save his friends from a 100-story drop!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Toying Around: Part 1
programme.desc: The new kid in town drives Yuya bananas when he begs Yuya to be his duel teacher! Unfortunately for Yuya, this blue-haired battler wont give up until Yuya gives in!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Toying Around: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuyas getting schooled by his wannabe student, Sora! Can Yuya turn things around and teach Sora a lesson about winning, or is Yuyas Pendulum power not going to make the grade?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Mr. Mystery
programme.desc: Still steaming from his loss to Yuya, Sylvio looks to get some payback! But when Zuzu steps in to stop his plans, a mysterious stranger comes out of the shadows to show her how its done!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Bad Business
programme.desc: The Leo Institute is looking to take over Yuyas duel school, and theyre bringing 3 of their most dangerous duelists to take down whoever dares stand in their way!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Dueling with the Stars
programme.desc: The battle to save Yuyas duel school goes galactic when Yuya faces off against Leo Institutes Dipper, an out-of-this-world duelist whose interstellar skills could have Yuya seeing stars!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: You Show 'Em
programme.desc: Its a gem of a duel when Zuzu faces a fierce Fusion Summoner whose jewel monsters are a cut above the rest! Can Zuzu and her Divas belt out a victory, or will the Leo Institutes diamond of a duelist force a final face-off?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Going, Going, Gong
programme.desc: Its all up to Gong to save You Show from falling into the hands of the Leo Institute! Can Gong stare down defeat without moving his feet, or will a sword-swinging Syncro Summoner slice and dice his way to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battle Under the Big Top
programme.desc: Its a battle under the big top, but no ones clowning around! Yuya duels Declan to determine the fate of Yuyas duel school!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Circus Surprise!
programme.desc: Declan has a surprise in store that could swing the duel his way! Can Yuya take down the best the Leo Institute has to offer, or will Declans deck prove to be unbeatable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Show Must Go On
programme.desc: Yuyas down in the dumps, but Principal Boyles not having it! Looking to snap Yuya out of his funk, Skip challenges Yuya to a duel to prove that the show must go on!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: In It To Win It
programme.desc: Still stinging from her defeat against the Leo Institute, Zuzu turns to an unlikely source for some assistance Sora! But before her training can commence, a familiar looking stranger shows up, putting her lesson on hold!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Menu Venue: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya is served a heaping helping of culinary catastrophe when he duels a celebrity chef with a menu full of merciless food monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Menu Venue: Part 2
programme.desc: The table is set for a frenzied food fight to the finish! Can Yuya handle what Chef Pepper dishes out, or will he lose a lot more than his appetite?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Trapped in a Card
programme.desc: Its a case of mistaken identity when Yuya is eyed as the primary suspect for attacking Leo students! But when Yuya crosses paths with the real culprit, things go from bad to worse!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Quiz Quagmire: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya matches minds with the quiz whiz extraordinaire Pierre LSuprieure in a duel of wits! Can Yuya outsmart the smartest boy on Earth, or will Yuya end up scratching his head in defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Quiz Quagmire: Part 2
programme.desc: In the finale of the mind-bending match thats part-duel, part-quiz show - one wrong answer could mean curtains for Yuya! Can he outduel and outthink a trivia whiz whos never wrong?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Beyond Belief
programme.desc: Duelists throughout the city are continuously being attacked, and everyone is on the search to find out the who, how and why!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Date With Fate: Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Date With Fate: Part 2
programme.desc: As Yuyas battle against the fortunetelling predictress Aura flares to its finish, it becomes crystal clear that Yuyas danger-filled future is becoming a reality!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: For Our Tomorrows
programme.desc: Mysteries are revealed when the masked duelist whos been terrorizing Leo Institute students is confronted and challenged to a battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battle Between Buddies: Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battle Between Buddies: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between best buds Yuya and Gong for a spot in the Arc League Championships rages to a friend-zied finish!

programme.desc: Zuzu takes center stage in an epic rematch against Leo Institutes dueling diamond, Julia Krystal! Will Zuzu avenge her earlier loss and walk away a winner, or will history repeat itself and leave Zuzu singing the blues?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Gong the Strong
programme.desc: When Gongs old sparring partner sets a trap for Yuya, the only way Gong can save his friend is to forfeit his duel and get tossed from the tourney!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 1
programme.desc: Sylvio finally has just the thing to take Yuya down a deck full of Pendulum Cards! Could Yuya's days in the spotlight be done for?
programme.sub-title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuya is off his game and on the run as Sylvio zeroes in on zeroing out his life points! If Yuya cant get into the swing of things, this could be his final performance!
programme.sub-title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Making the Cut: Part 1
programme.desc: Sora is psyched to put on a showstopping duel for the fans, but his opponent Shay is set to turn Soras one man show into a no man show!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Making the Cut: Part 2
programme.desc: Sora and Shay's heated duel hits its boiling point when dark secrets about their hidden history come to light! Could there be something sinister behind Soras sweet-toothed smile?

programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy recruits Tony Tony Chopper to join the Straw Hat crew as the ships doctor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Outcast's Dream! Hiriluk the Quack!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine, the devastatingly sexy lady thief who'll stop at nothing to make her steal, has her sights set on a religious cult's secret treasure when a new man waltzes into her life: Lupin III.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A war is going down between the Italian and Chinese Mafias, and Fujiko ends up in the middle of it. A mysterious bodyguard named Daisuke Jigen stands at the heart of the matter, but who knows whose side he's really on?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: She's always getting in trouble / But she may give you a square deal / She's always sharing everything / Except for every steal / Even a lowly samurai / Is quick to see the appeal / How do you solve a problem like Fujiko Mine?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The famous diva Aiyan's bejeweled mask has been targeted by Lupin the Third, and Zenigata determines to "set a thief to catch a thief." Who will get to the mask first: Fujiko or Lupin?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Using her womanly wiles, Fujiko convinces Lupin to retrieve the legendary Laughing Peacock from an Egyptian pyramid. However, the seemingly simple job turns into a fierce race when Jigen sets his sights on the treasure too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko infiltrates a Catholic girls' school and sets about stealing all the maidens' hearts to pave the way for an even bigger theft. But Oscar knows exactly what she's up to, and he's got a plan to stop her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The nation of Carib is in political upheaval, and Fujiko is in the thick of the action, naturally. What is she doing posing as a reporter? Will revolutionary Philadel Kest win her heart where Lupin has failed? And what is Goemon doing on that fighter jet?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A fortune-teller supposedly able to predict his clients' deaths is for some reason seeking out Lupin's prior victims and giving them some very disturbing readings. What's the connection to Fujiko Mine, and how far will she go to see this job through?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Magical realism plus human trafficking plus Lupin and Daisuke Jigen plus a spa vacation plus Fujiko off the deep end equals... Well, you'll just have to find out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Count Almeida has a job for Lupin, and he's not about to take no for an answer. When Lupin and Zenigata both separately make their way to the Count's villa seeking answers, the trail of clues leads to a ghost town with just one inhabitant.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A recent string of particularly flashy thefts has been tied to Fujiko Mine, who seems to have taken to sending written warnings to the police just like Lupin does. But if you ask Inspector Zenigata, something smells fishy about the whole thing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Oscar's body is missing, girls are being kidnapped all over the world, and Lupin still hasn't made good on his threat to steal Fujiko Mine. There's only one thing to do: It's time to pay a visit to one Count Lus Yu Almeida.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 1)

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: In the season finale, all the players have finally come together, and it's time to see how the tale ends.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 2)

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of Goemon the Thirteenth

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Dreamland (2019)
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: The Gunman (2015)
programme.desc: A former Special Forces soldier (Sean Penn) who has PTSD tries to reconnect with his longtime lover, but must first find out who wants him dead... and why.

programme.title: Stop-Loss (2008)
programme.desc: A soldier (Ryan Phillippe) whose tour of duty has ended takes matters into his own hands when the Army tries to force him back into active duty in Iraq.

programme.title: World Trade Center (2006)
programme.desc: Two Port Authority officers become trapped in the rubble of the World Trade Center after going in to help people escape from the buildings during the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.

programme.title: Star Trek: Section 31 (2025)
programme.desc: Emperor Philippa Georgiou faces the sins of her past after joining a secret division of Starfleet thats tasked with protecting the United Federation of Planets.

programme.title: Marathon Man (1976)
programme.desc: The CIA and a Nazi death-camp dentist (Laurence Olivier) chase a New York graduate student (Dustin Hoffman).

programme.title: Bull (2021)
programme.desc: Ten years after he was last seen, a vicious mob enforcer returns home to find his son and methodically track down the gang that double-crossed him. His quest for revenge soon leads to a savage showdown between his wife and her mob boss father.

programme.title: Black Rain (1989)
programme.desc: Two New York police detectives (Michael Douglas, Andy Garcia) take an underworld upstart back to Osaka, Japan.

programme.title: What Remains (2022)
programme.desc: A small town pastor is forced to reckon with an act of forgiveness when the convict he forgave for murdering his wife returns to town five years later, while the town sheriff investigates another murder that may be related.

programme.title: Breathe (2024)
programme.desc: Maya and her young daughter are forced to live underground when Earth is left uninhabitable due to a lack of oxygen. They soon find themselves in a fight for survival when a mysterious couple arrive and claim to know the fate of Mayas husband.

programme.title: Raging Grace (2023)
programme.desc: Nothing is as it seems when an undocumented Filipina immigrant takes a job as a caretaker for a terminally ill man in a lavish home. She and her daughter soon become ensnared by a terrible secret that threatens to tear them apart.

programme.title: Dont Knock Twice (2016)
programme.desc: A mother looking to reconnect with her estranged daughter attracts the attention of a demonic witch.

programme.title: Downhill Racer (1969)
programme.desc: A cocky American (Robert Redford) skis and apres-skis Europe, training with his coach (Gene Hackman) for the Olympics.

programme.title: Point Break (1991)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Keanu Reeves) turns California surfer to nab bank robbers who wear rubber masks of four ex-presidents.

programme.title: The Infernal Machine (2022)
programme.desc: Reclusive and controversial author Bruce Cogburn is drawn out of hiding when he begins to receive endless letters from an obsessive fan. What ensues is a dangerous labyrinth as Bruce searches for the person behind the cryptic messages.

programme.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones (2014)
programme.desc: A private detective (Liam Neeson) agrees to help a drug trafficker (Dan Stevens) find the people who kidnapped and murdered his wife.

programme.title: Primal Fear (1996)
programme.desc: A publicity-seeking Chicago lawyer (Richard Gere) vies with an embittered ex-lover (Laura Linney) prosecuting an altar boy (Edward Norton) in a high-profile murder case.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker (2002)
programme.desc: The commander (Harrison Ford) of a Russian submarine tries to avert a disaster after a nuclear reactor malfunctions.

programme.title: 6 Days (2017)
programme.desc: In April 1980, gunmen storm the Iranian Embassy in London. Highly trained SAS operatives prepare a counterattack, hoping to end the hostage situation in one swift blow.

programme.title: The Fifth Estate (2013)
programme.desc: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange (Benedict Cumberbatch) and his colleague, Daniel Domscheit-Berg (Daniel Bruhl), provide a platform for whistle-blowers to leak covert data anonymously and expose government secrets and corporate crimes.

programme.title: Freedoms Path (2022)
programme.desc: When Union soldier William runs from battle, hes taken to safety by a heroic young Black man. Kitch is part of a secret community of freed slaves running a section of the Underground Railroad, but a desperate slave catcher is on their trail.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West (1968)
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Time in the West (1968)
programme.desc: An outlaw (Henry Fonda) working for a railroad magnate fights a stranger (Charles Bronson) for a New Orleans widows (Claudia Cardinale) land.

programme.title: Warrior Strong (2023)
programme.desc: Trying to save his career, a suspended professional basketball player returns home to coach his former high school team.

programme.title: Murder Company (2024)
programme.desc: During the D-Day invasion, a group of U.S. soldiers must smuggle a member of the French resistance behind enemy lines to assassinate a high-value Nazi target.

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: Judgment Night (1993)
programme.desc: On their way to a boxing match, four young men take a wrong turn in Chicago and find danger as witnesses to murder.

programme.title: The D Train (2015)
programme.desc: A nebbish (Jack Black) spins a web of lies around a famous former classmate (James Marsden) to win his friendship and persuade him to attend their high-school reunion.

programme.title: Major League (1989)
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland teams new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Staten Island Summer (2015)
programme.desc: Danny and Frank work as lifeguards for the summer and make plans to throw the wildest party of the season.

programme.title: Good Mourning (2022)
programme.desc: A movie star must choose between pursuing his one true love or landing a life-changing role in a film.

programme.title: Sexy Wives Sinsations (2013)
programme.desc: The staff at a sex clinic uses erotic role-playing to help married couples.

programme.title: Gods Petting You (2022)
programme.desc: A heroin addict falls in love with a struggling sex addict, and together the pair hatch a plan to steal a small fortune from a porn star.

programme.title: On the Edge (2022)
programme.desc: A metro driver witnesses his son die and sets out to track down those who are responsible.

programme.title: Confess, Fletch (2022)
programme.desc: While investigating a case of stolen paintings, the roguishly charming and endlessly troublesome Fletch becomes the prime suspect in a murder. To prove his innocence, he must sift through a long list of suspects, including his own girlfriend.

programme.title: The Crusades (2023)
programme.desc: Three friends set out for one last great weekend while dodging authority, love affairs, and violent foes.

programme.title: Monster Summer (2024)
programme.desc: A mysterious force disrupts Noah and his friends summer fun. They team up with a retired police detective to embark on a monstrous adventure to save their island.

programme.title: Hands Up (2021)
programme.desc: After his cousin is shot and killed by a white police officer in Chicago, and Black Lives Matter protests spread across the city, a Black teen desperately fights for a way out of the most notorious murder capital in America.

programme.title: Hell or High Water (2016)
programme.desc: With a Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) hot on their tail, an ex-convict (Ben Foster) and his brother (Chris Pine) plan a series of heists against the bank thats about to foreclose on their family ranch.

programme.title: Gangs of New York (2002)
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Halls sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.
